original_title: The Fall of the Roman Empire
overview: In the year 180 A.D. Germanic tribes are about to invade the Roman empire from the north. In the midst of this crisis ailing emperor Marcus Aurelius has to make a decission about his successor between his son Commodus, who is obsessed by power, and the loyal general Gaius Livius.
tagline: Never before a spectacle like the fall of the Roman empire
title: The Fall of the Roman Empire
